title: Facebook usage reach in the United States 2019 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Women and lowest at Response Men.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 12.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Women and lowest at Response Men.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 2 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Women and lowest at Response Men.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 12.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 75.0 is found at Response Women and the minimum is found at Men where Response is 63.0.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 12.0.
The Response Women tends to be 1.09 percent higher than average.
